attributes.action: Prosecute 2DAY FM radio pair Mel Greig and Michael Christian for Treason
attributes.additional_details: Mel Grieg and Michael Christian the hosts of the Australian radio programme, 2DAY FM should be prosecuted for high treason for their deplorable act of trying to dupe the nursing staff at the King Edward VII hospital.  Their callous act has resulted in the death of an innocent nurse and untold grief for her family and co-workers.
